rule0.name: High
rule0.description: when Jump drive temperature's Temperature  >= 3900  AND when Jump drive temperature's Temperature  <= 5200

rule0.name: High
rule0.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Temperature:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">High</span>
rule0.description: when Jump drive temperature's Temperature  >= 3900  AND when Jump drive temperature's Temperature  <= 5200

rule0.name: Ready for prep
rule0.description: when Tachyon-baryonic coherence's Coherence  < 100  AND when Tachyon-baryonic coherence's Coherence  >= 20

rule0.name: Ready for prep
rule0.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Tachyon-baryonic<br>coherence:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{coherence}}</span>
rule0.description: when Tachyon-baryonic coherence's Coherence  < 100  AND when Tachyon-baryonic coherence's Coherence  >= 20

rule0.name: Broken or cooldown
rule0.description: when Jump drive state's State  == 0  OR when Jump drive state's State  == 1

rule0.name: (2) Cooldown
rule0.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Regulation jump:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{readyT}}</span>

rule2.name: (3a) Not ready
rule2.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Regulation jump:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{readyT}}</span>
rule2.description: when Jump drive state's State  >= 2  AND when Jump drive state's State  <= 6  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  > 0

rule3.name: (3b) Ready
rule3.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Regulation jump:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{readyT}}</span>
rule3.description: when Jump drive state's State  >= 2  AND when Jump drive state's State  <= 6  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  <= 0

rule4.name: (4a) Jump init yellow
rule4.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Jump in:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{jumpT}}</span>
rule4.description: when Jump drive state's State  == 7  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  > 0

rule5.name: (5a) Jumping yellow
rule5.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Jump duration:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{jumpT}}</span>
rule5.description: when Jump drive state's State  == 8  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  > 0

rule6.name: (4b) Jump init blue
rule6.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Jump in:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{jumpT}}</span>
rule6.description: when Jump drive state's State  == 7  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  <= 0

rule7.name: (5b) Jumping blue
rule7.label: <span class="orbitron bold" style="font-size:80%">Jump duration:</span><br><span class="orbitron light">{{jumpT}}</span>
rule7.description: when Jump drive state's State  == 8  AND when Ready seconds's Ready remaining  <= 0
